title: Martin Graff - Making Internet Dating Work for You
description:
Let Martin help to increase your chances of meeting someone through online dating and Apps! The world of online dating is a dynamic one with things constantly changing. There are now multitudes of online dating sites, including those dedicated to finding partners for casual affairs. It is therefore imperative to keep ahead of the game in online dating.	
So how can you maximize your chances of finding a romantic partner online? How do other people actually portray themselves online? How do you come across to others online? This session will answer all of these questions and more.

In this workshop session Dr Graff will also give some practical advice on:

â€¢ Finding the right dating site or app for you.
â€¢ How to construct your dating site profile for maximum effect
â€¢ How to interact with others online - the way to approach an online liaison with a potential dating partner.
â€¢ The first steps in a first face-to-face meeting
